mapper.select: INSERT INTO USER (id, password, isDeleted, userType) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, 0,'MEMBER')

SELECT u.id, u.password, u.isDeleted, u.userType, TO_CHAR(h.createdAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdAtStr, TO_CHAR(h.updatedAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as updatedAtStr, FROM USER u LEFT JOIN HISTORY h ON u.id = h.entityId and entityName = 'USER' WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, password, isDeleted, userType, TO_CHAR(h.createdAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdAtStr, TO_CHAR(h.updatedAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as updatedAtStr, FROM USER u LEFT JOIN HISTORY h ON u.id = h.entityId and entityName = 'USER' WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE USER SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
